meta.job_title: Construction Project Engineer / Assistant Project Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop thorough understanding of Architectural, Structural, Civil, and MEP plans; foster relationships with project design professionals.
Streamline subcontractor bidding process, from bid lists to RFP packages, ensuring comprehensive scope coverage.
Efficiently manage project budgets, presenting to senior leadership and updating as design evolves.
Utilize CPM scheduling software for macro and micro schedules; oversee critical path, schedule float, and logistics.
Ensure effective project management through OSHA compliance, subcontractor oversight, quality control, and Procore documentation management.

skills.skill: Architectural, Structural, Civil, and MEP Plans Understanding

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction or related field
